text: The British Netminder of the Year award is an annual British ice hockey award made to the best British netminder as voted for by members of Ice Hockey Journalists UK. The award was first made in 1999. ==Past winners== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- ! Season !! Winner !! title: British Netminder of the Year
